values.description: Allow EKS cluster to connect to RDS MySQL

ingress.description: Allow inbound MySQL from the EKS service

values.name: eks-to-rds-prod-0

values.description: Allow bastion to access EKS API endpoint

database_secret_arn.description: ARN of the Secrets Manager secret for the database

private_subnet_ids.description: Map of AZ to private subnet IDs

public_subnet_ids.description: Map of AZ to public subnet IDs

rds_instance_endpoint.description: The endpoint of the RDS instance

vpc_cidr.description: The CIDR block of the VPC

description.constant_value: Allow EKS cluster to connect to RDS MySQL

constant_value.description: Allow inbound MySQL from the EKS service

description.constant_value: Security group for EKS worker nodes

constant_value.description: Allow bastion to access worker nodes

description.constant_value: Allow bastion to access EKS API endpoint
Allow worker nodes to communicate with each other

created_security_group_id.description: The ID of the security group created by this module (if any).

ec2_role_arn.description: The Self Hosted EC2 Runner Role

instance_arn.description: The ARN of the EC2 instance.

instance_id.description: The ID of the EC2 instance.

private_ip.description: The private IP address of the instance.

public_ip.description: The public IP address of the instance (if applicable).

ami_id.description: The AMI ID for the instance. Can be from a data source or a static value.

associate_public_ip_address.description: Set to true to associate an ephemeral public IP. Ignored if associate_eip is true.

create_security_group.description: Set to true to create a new security group for this instance.

existing_security_group_ids.description: A list of existing security group IDs to attach to the instance.

iam_instance_profile.description: The name of the IAM instance profile to associate with the instance.

key_name.description: The name of the SSH key pair to associate with the instance.

root_volume_size.description: The size of the root EBS volume in GiB.

root_volume_type.description: The type of the root EBS volume (e.g., gp3, io2).

sg_egress_rules.description: A list of egress rule objects for the created security group.

sg_ingress_rules.description: A list of ingress rule objects for the created security group.

source_dest_check.description: Controls whether source/destination checking is enabled. Should be false for NAT instances.

subnet_id.description: The ID of the subnet to launch the instance into.

tags.description: A map of tags to apply to all created resources.

user_data.description: The user data script to run on instance launch. Will be base64 encoded.

vpc_id.description: The ID of the VPC to launch the instance in.

cluster_certificate_authority_data.description: Base64 encoded certificate data required to communicate with the cluster

cluster_endpoint.description: Endpoint for the EKS cluster API server

cluster_oidc_issuer_url.description: The URL on the EKS cluster OIDC Issuer

cluster_security_group_id.description: Security group ID of the EKS cluster control plane

node_group_arn.description: ARN of the EKS node group

node_group_name.description: Name of the EKS node group

node_group_role_arn.description: IAM role ARN associated with the node group

node_group_status.description: Status of the EKS node group

oidc_provider_arn.description: ARN of the OIDC Provider for EKS

description.constant_value: KMS key for EKS Launch Template EBS volume encryption

ami_id.description: AMI ID for the launch template.

aws_region.description: AWS region for the EKS cluster.

capacity_reservation_preference.description: The capacity reservation preference for the launch template.

capacity_type.description: Capacity type for the EKS worker nodes (e.g., ON_DEMAND, SPOT).

cpu_core_count.description: The number of CPU cores for the launch template.

cpu_threads_per_core.description: The number of threads per CPU core for the launch template.

credit_specification_cpu_credits.description: The CPU credit option for the launch template.

disable_api_stop.description: Whether to disable API stop for the launch template.

disable_api_termination.description: Whether to disable API termination for the launch template.

disk_size.description: Disk size (in GiB) for the EKS worker nodes.

ebs_optimized.description: Whether the launch template is EBS optimized.

ec2_role_for_eks.description: ec2 role for the eks access identity

ec2_roles_for_eks.description: List of IAM role ARNs to be granted access to the EKS cluster.

enable_elastic_load_balancing.description: Boolean to enable or disable elastic load balancing in the EKS cluster.

enable_encryption_config.description: Boolean to enable or disable encryption config in the EKS cluster.

enable_kubernetes_network_config.description: Boolean to enable or disable kubernetes network config in the EKS cluster.

instance_initiated_shutdown_behavior.description: The shutdown behavior for instances launched from the launch template.

instance_market_type.description: The market type for instances launched from the launch template.

instance_type.description: The instance type for instances launched from the launch template.

instance_types.description: List of instance types for the EKS worker nodes.

ip_family.description: The IP family used for pod and service IPs.

key_name.description: The key name for instances launched from the launch template.

launch_template_ebs_encryption_flag.description: Whether the EBS volume for the launch template is encrypted.

launch_template_ebs_size.description: Size of the EBS volume for the launch template.

launch_template_security_group_ids.description: List of security group IDs for the launch template.

metadata_options_http_endpoint.description: The http endpoint setting for instances launched from the launch template.

metadata_options_http_put_response_hop_l.description: The http put response hop limit for instances launched from the launch template.

metadata_options_http_tokens.description: The http tokens setting for instances launched from the launch template.

metadata_options_instance_metadata_tags.description: The instance metadata tags setting for instances launched from the launch template.

monitoring_enabled.description: Whether monitoring is enabled for instances launched from the launch template.

network_interface_associate_public_ip_ad.description: Whether to associate a public IP address with the network interface for instances launched from the launch template.

placement_availability_zone.description: The availability zone for instances launched from the launch template.

public_access_cidrs.description: List of CIDR blocks that are allowed access to the public Kubernetes API server endpoint.

service_ipv4_cidr.description: The CIDR block to assign Kubernetes service IPs.

subnet_ids.description: List of VPC Subnet IDs (typically private) for the worker nodes and EKS ENIs.

db_instance_arn.description: The ARN of the RDS instance

db_instance_endpoint.description: The endpoint of the RDS instance

db_secret_arn.description: The ARN of the secret containing the database credentials

backup_retention_period.description: The number of days to retain backups for. 0 disables automated backups

create_rds.description: Whether to create RDS instance (0 or 1)

db_instance_class.description: The instance type of the RDS instance

db_username.description: The master username for the database

security_group_id.description: The ID of the security group to associate with the RDS instance

subnet_ids.description: List of private subnet IDs for the DB subnet group

vpc_id.description: VPC ID where the RDS instance will be created

availability_zones.description: List of availability zones in the region

private_subnet_ids.description: Map of AZ to private subnet IDs

public_subnet_ids.description: Map of AZ to public subnet IDs

vpc_cidr.description: The CIDR block of the VPC

private_subnet_cidrs.description: List of CIDR blocks for private subnets

public_subnet_cidrs.description: List of CIDR blocks for public subnets

ami_id.description: The AMI ID for the main application EC2 instance.

create_rds.description: Whether to create RDS instance (0 or 1)

enable_nat_gateway.description: Enable NAT Gateway for private subnets

enable_nat_instance.description: Enable NAT Instance instead of NAT Gateway

instance_type.description: The instance type for the main application EC2 instance.

key_name.description: The name of the SSH key pair for the application instance.

private_subnet_cidrs.description: List of CIDR blocks for private subnets

public_subnet_cidrs.description: List of CIDR blocks for public subnets

rds_allocated_storage.description: The allocated storage for the RDS database in GB

rds_database_name.description: The name of the RDS database

rds_engine_version.description: The engine version for the MySQL RDS database

rds_instance_class.description: The instance class for the RDS database
